message:
Dear Team,

This is to inform you that {{ doc.employee_name }} is in the process of separation from the organization.

You are requested to perform the necessary offboarding activities as per your responsibilities. Kindly refer to the {{ doc.doctype }} record for more details and actions required.

You can access the record directly using the link below

Thank you for your support and timely action.

Best regards,
HR Team,
{{ doc.company }}
name: Employee Separation Notification
subject: Employee Separation Notification – {{ doc.employee_name }}
